name: Your Magic Circle
description:
We made this short game for Mini Jam 62, where the theme was colours.
We were inspired by the concept of "the magic circle," first written down by Johan Huizinga in his 1938 book, Homo Ludens.
A book, that actually neither of us read. HD thinks that's funny. Medza thinks that's sad.

Art Direction: Medza

Project Direction: DH
